resources.string: Device doesn\'t support PhysicalSensorProbe %s specified in user configuration, this probe will not be activated
PhysicalSensorProbe %s\'s window size (%s) specified in user configuration must be at least %s, this probe will not be activated
Device doesn\'t support OnEventPhysicalSensorProbe %s specified in user configuration, this probe will not be activated
No featurable probes has been activated, even if features module is specified as active in user configuration, this module will not be activated.
No probes has been activated, CK service will be immediately terminated
Context kit can not be activated because is already started, current status: %s
Context kit can not be stopped now because is initializing or already stopped, current status: %s
Current version of ContextKit has no match between stored categories and new category: %s
Can not find a category for package %s nor in storage and nor through play store requests
A problem has occurred during parsing of %s Play Store webpage, check if URL information in class PlayStoreRequest are up to date
